    • registerPlace

      public boolean registerPlace(String placeName, Department department, double area, TypePlace type_place, Calendar opening_Date, String photo, String protective_comunity, double maintenance_budget, int specie_per_habitad)
      Description: Stores a new place with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      placeName - the name of the place
      department - the department where the place is located
      area - the area of the place
      type_place - the type of the place
      opening_Date - the opening date of the place
      photo - the photo of the place
      protective_comunity - the protective community of the place
      maintenance_budget - the maintenance budget of the place
      specie_per_habitad - the number of species per habitat in the place
      Returns:
      true if the place is successfully stored, false otherwise

    • validatePlaceName

      public boolean validatePlaceName(String placeName)
      Description:Validates if a place name is unique among stored places.
      Parameters:
      placeName - the name of the place to validate
      Returns:
      true if the place name is unique, false otherwise

    • addSpecieToPlace

      public boolean addSpecieToPlace(String placeName, String specieName, TypeSpecie specieType, String speciePhoto, int amountPerPlace, boolean availableSpecies)
      Description: Adds a specie to the place with the given name.
      Parameters:
      placeName - the name of the place to add the specie to
      specieName - the name of the specie to add
      specieType - the type of the specie to add
      speciePhoto - the photo of the specie to add
      amountPerPlace - the amount of the specie per place
      availableSpecies - true if the specie is available, false otherwise
      Returns:
      true if the specie is successfully added, false otherwise

    • getSpecieInPlace

      public Specie getSpecieInPlace(String placeName, String specieName)
      Description: Retrieves the specie with the specified name from the place with the given name.
      Parameters:
      placeName - the name of the place to search for the specie
      specieName - the name of the specie to retrieve
      Returns:
      the specie with the specified name, or null if not found

    • removeSpecieFromPlace

      public boolean removeSpecieFromPlace(String placeName, String specieName)
      Description: Removes the specie with the given name from the place with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      placeName - the name of the place to remove the specie from
      specieName - the name of the specie to remove
      Returns:
      true if the specie is successfully removed, false otherwise

    • modifySpecies

      public boolean modifySpecies(String placeName, String specieName, TypeSpecie newSpeciesType, String newSpeciesPhoto, int newSpeciesCount)
      Description: Modifies the properties of a specie in the place with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      placeName - the name of the place containing the specie
      specieName - the name of the specie to modify
      newSpeciesType - the new type of the specie
      newSpeciesPhoto - the new photo of the specie
      newSpeciesCount - the new count of the specie
      Returns:
      true if the specie is successfully modified, false otherwise

    • registerCommunity

      public boolean registerCommunity(String communityName, TypeEhnicity ethnicity, String representantName, String representantPhone, int population, MayorProblems mayorProblems, String offeredProduct)
      Description: Stores a new community with the provided details in the communities array.
      Parameters:
      communityName - the name of the community
      ethnicity - the ethnicity of the community
      representantName - the name of the community's representative
      representantPhone - the phone number of the community's representative
      population - the population of the community
      mayorProblems - the major problems faced by the community
      offeredProduct - the product offered by the community
      Returns:
      true if the community is successfully stored, false otherwise

    • addProductToCommunity

      public boolean addProductToCommunity(String communityName, String productName, double percentageNaturalProduct, TypeProduct productType, boolean handmade, boolean availableProduct)
      Description: Adds a product to a community.
      Parameters:
      communityName - The name of the community to which the product will be added.
      productName - The name of the product to add.
      percentageNaturalProduct - The percentage of natural product.
      productType - The type of product.
      handmade - Indicates if the product is handmade.
      availableProduct - Indicates if the product is available.
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully added, false if it could not be added.

    • removeProductFromCommunity

      public boolean removeProductFromCommunity(String communityName, String productName)
      Description: Removes a product from a community.
      Parameters:
      communityName - The name of the community from which the product will be removed.
      productName - The name of the product to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully removed, false if it could not be removed.
